verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The curse is rolled away! The grave has lost her prey! Dost see that noble throng Singing a triumph song? Dost hear the words they sing? "O death, where is thy sting? Where, grave, thy victory?"{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The saints in glad array are praising God always, For death has been destroyed, 'Tis rendred null and void. With joyful voice they sing: "O death, where is thy sting? Where, grave, thy victory?"{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Marvellous display of Life's reality, That it could swallow up Death's dark and bitter cup. Dost hear the whole Church sing? "O death, where is thy sting? Where, grave, thy victory?"{/lang-eng}
